about_the_game:
If you want to thank Composer of the game, it is a good opportunity for that.

All money from the OST will be sent to the Composer.

To have a cup of coffee... or tea, who knows his tastes?

For this you will get full Aborigenus OST. All tracks are made of natural recorded sounds.
Don't expect from them high bitrate or meta-tags, though. Those tracks are true "underground".

Shaka-shaka!

List of tracks:
1-Menu song
2-Peaceful woods
3-Chicken Riders!
4-Desert
5-Steps in the nighе
6-Cave
7-Triumph of Evil
8-Boss

name: Aborigenus - OST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Windows 7 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: It is a full OST of Aborigenus, good chance to say thanks to the composer and get a music from the game.
